General.Name: Vinacafe Bien Hoa JSC
General.Description: VinaCafé Bien Hoa Joint Stock Company engages in the manufacture and sale of food products in Vietnam and internationally. The company operates in Coffee and Non-Alcoholic Drinks, and Others segments. Its products include a range of coffee, instant cereals, and non-alcoholic drinks. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Bien Hoa, Vietnam. VinaCafé Bien Hoa Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Masan Beverage Company Limited.
